
h1. Send Files

You can send files to another contacts through a *Conversation* window.

Follow these steps to send files to other contacts:

*Step 1\.* On the *Conversation* window, click the
!SendFileButton.png!
     button on the *Action* bar.




!SendFile.png!



You will be directed to select a file on your local computer:



!SendFile1.png!


*Step 2.* Select a file that you want to send to the selected contact.


On the *Conversation* window of the contact who you want to send files, he/she will receive the sent file:


!SendFile2.png!


* Clicks the *Accept* button to accept and save the received file to computer.
* Or click *Deny* to deny receiving the sent file.
